original_text: After Amasa had been removed from the road, everyone went on with Joab to pursue Sheba son of Bikri.
korean_text: 아마사를 큰길에서 옮겨가매 사람들이 다 요압을 따라 비그리의 아들 세바를 뒤쫓아가니라

sentences.original_text: After Amasa had been removed from the road

sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 요압과 함께 계속 나아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to pursue Sheba son of Bikri
